hero.title: Transparent P2P deals near you
hero.subtitle: Exchange crypto directly with people nearby — no intermediaries or hidden terms. Fast, simple and reliable.

howWorks.title: How it works?
howWorks.find: Find a counterparty: apply filters → contact via email/messenger → confirm the details.
howWorks.post: Post a listing: sign in → create a listing → get responses.
howWorks.tip: Tip: verify incoming funds and never send prepayment to strangers.

safety.title: Is it safe?
safety.short: ProP2P is a classifieds board: deals are peer‑to‑peer between users. Your safety depends on your actions. Meet in public or verify over video, avoid prepayments, confirm funds on-chain/bank, never share seed phrases.

contact.title: How to contact a seller/buyer?
contact.text: The contact (email/messenger) is in the listing and available after sign‑in. Write and agree on the details.

fees.title: Fees and platform pricing
fees.text: Deal fee? Listing or renewal fee? Subscription to remove limits? None of that! Trade crypto freely and simply — directly with people.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.p1: ProP2P is a classifieds board for peer‑to‑peer crypto deals. We do not escrow funds or act as an intermediary.
termsPage.li1: Users are solely responsible for their actions and compliance with local laws.
termsPage.li2: Illegal content, spam and fraud are prohibited.
termsPage.li3: We may remove content that violates rules and suspend abusive accounts.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.p1: We collect only the data necessary to operate the service (account email and basic profile). We do not sell personal data.
privacyPage.li1: Your email is used for authentication and notifications.
privacyPage.li2: You may request deletion of your account via support.
privacyPage.li3: Cookies/localStorage may be used to keep your session.

safetyModal.title: Safety tips
safetyModal.item1: Meet in public places or verify identity via video call.
safetyModal.item2: Do not prepay strangers. Split the amount into parts.
safetyModal.item3: Check network/address and confirm funds on-chain/bank before handing over cash/crypto.
safetyModal.item4: Communicate only via contacts from the listing. Ignore external links and requests.
safetyModal.item5: Never share private keys, seed phrase or verification codes.
safetyModal.item6: Write down the agreement: time, amount, rate, place.
safetyModal.item7: If in doubt — stop the deal.
